woodmulti1.title: Wood Multiplier
woodmulti1.text:
x1.5 All Wood Production
0 PP
woodmulti1.bought: if (!prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.checkIfCanBuy()) { return; }; prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.isBought = true; resources.pp -= prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.pp; prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.level++; prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.pp *= 3.5; updateVisuals();

autowood1.title: Auto Wood
autowood1.bought: if (!prestigeUpgrades.autowood1.checkIfCanBuy()) { return; }; prestigeUpgrades.autowood1.isBought = true; resources.pp -= prestigeUpgrades.autowood1.pp; prestigeUpgrades.autowood1.level++; prestigeUpgrades.autowood1.pp *= 3.5; updateVisuals();
